name: ErrorHaiku
0:
”Alexa, open Error Haiku”
”Alexa, launch Error Haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: error haiku
des:
Error Haiku is here to help you get technologically centered. Let us help you avoid the temptation to throw your non-responding gadget, Wi-fi or computer out of the nearest window. 

It's much cheaper than replacing your kit after a fit of tech-pique. Plus you won't need months of therapy. 

Be calm. deep breath. Relax. All will be well.

Examples;

"The hard drive
earns its living
hidden, then silence forever"

"My battery
How much more of it remains? 
life is brief"

"The pavement is unrelenting. 
So many cracks. 
A screen."

Got an Error Haiku you'd like to see added? just drop us a line in the comments :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
